DOC.brief_title: Comparison Cytokine Clearance Between SLED-f Using High Cut-off Dialyzer High-flux Dialyzer Septic AKI Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Hypercytokinemia contribute major role pathogenesis associate high mortality sepsis-related acute kidney injury ( AKI ) . Reductions cytokine report improve clinical outcome . Online sustain low-efficiency diafiltration ( SLED-f ) use traditional high-flux ( HF ) dialyzer could remove cytokine . Interestingly , potential enhance cytokine removal use newly design high cut-off ( HCO ) dialyzer could theoretically remove large molecular weight solute never study SLED-f before.This pilot randomize control trial conduct sepsis-related AKI patient compare efficacy cytokine removal include interleukin ( IL ) -6 , IL-8 , IL-10 , tumor necrotic factor ( TNF ) -α six-hour SLED-f use HCO dialyzer ( HCO-SLED-f , n=8 ) HF dialyzer ( HF-SLED-f , n=8 ) .
